entry.title: Head of Arculus Product on the Latest U.S. Crypto Reserve News: How Arculus Can Keep Your Crypto Safe
entry.content:
What a week it has been in the crypto world with President Donald Trump announcing a Crypto Strategic Reserve that will include Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP, Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), and “other valuable cryptocurrencies.”  

Tom D’Eletto, Head of Arculus Product, shares his thoughts on this week’s news:  

If you want to hold and own all of the digital assets that have been announced as part of the U.S. Crypto Strategic Reserve (BTC, ETH, XRP, ADA, and SOL), you can turn to the Arculus Cold Storage Wallet. Arculus supports all of them. With security at the forefront, we believe in the power of cold storage to keep your crypto safe and secure. And yes, we are made in the USA. 

With digital assets, remember that true ownership and control comes from controlling your private keys. As a cold storage hardware wallet, Arculus generates and stores your private keys on your card’s secure element. 

Arculus makes self-custody easy and secure. If you need a login or password to access your digital assets, you’re trusting a middleman with the keys to your assets. If you wouldn’t trust a stranger with the keys to your home, why would you trust them with the keys to your digital assets? 

Multiple US states and multiple countries (now including the US) are exploring strategic crypto reserves; if you decide you want to own crypto, the best way to control your private keys is with a self-custody cold storage wallet like Arculus. 

Go to getarculus.com or the Arculus store on amazon.com to order yours and take control of your crypto.

entry.title: Singapore FinTech Festival Recap: Arculus on Digital Security and Payments
entry.content:
And that’s a wrap...! The Arculus Team joined the Singapore FinTech Festival to share our expertise and bring groundbreaking digital security solutions to the region. Keep reading to find out more about what the team got up to in Singapore.

"Improve Customer Experience, Engagement, and Security with Just a Tap": Highlights from Chief Product & Innovation Officer’s Exclusive Presentation

Arculus Chief Product & Innovation Officer, Dr. Adam Lowe delivered a thought-provoking session addressing key security challenges in the payments industry and how Arculus’ premium metal card technology can secure customers with just a tap:

  • Deterministic Authentication Security - With the global cybercrime industry valued at $9.5 trillion, Arculus uses deterministic security for reliable, secure authentication, bypassing the uncertainties of predictive models.
  • Passwordless Access - With 68% of breaches tied to weak passwords, Arculus leverages FIDO2 technology to streamline login with hardware-based passkey authentication that removes the need for passwords. All customers will need is their premium metal card as their physical passkey and their financial institution’s app. Customers simply tap their premium metal payment card to their smartphone to authenticate and login or approve high-value transactions.
  • Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for Seamless Security - Arculus’ MFA helps prevent account takeovers and reduces call center times, offering a simpler, more secure experience for customers and businesses.

Interview with Gem Gem Crypto

Adam sat down with Gem Gem Crypto to discuss what sets Arculus apart in the crypto cold wallet space, emphasizing how Arculus has the unique ability to blend multiple functionalities into one premium metal card. He also addressed how Arculus Authenticate fits into the AI hype, providing an added layer of security for logging into AI platforms.

Watch full video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TyzMxRZdTzM

Showcasing Arculus’ Solutions in Singapore

The energy and innovation were on full display at the Singapore FinTech Festival. From insightful presentations to engaging demos, our team connected with industry leaders, sharing our vision for a more secure and seamless customer experience.

Looking Ahead

Singapore FinTech Festival provided a valuable platform to engage with industry leaders on emerging security needs and trends in the APAC region. We look forward to building on these conversations as we continue to develop solutions that prioritize security while enhancing the customer experience.

entry.title: Arculus Partners with Litecoin: Introducing the Exclusive Co-Branded Card
entry.content:
Arculus is thrilled to announce our partnership with Litecoin, showcasing our commitment to enhancing security in crypto and Web3. Together, we have created an exclusive, co-branded, Arculus x Litecoin Cold Storage Wallet, which we will debut at the upcoming Litecoin Summit in Nashville.

A Glimpse into Litecoin's Significance

Litecoin, a major player in the cryptocurrency world, was designed to produce a maximum of 84 million Litecoins—four times as many units as Bitcoin. This demonstrates Litecoin's potential for broader adoption and its functionality as a robust digital currency.

Where to Get This Exclusive Arculus x Litecoin Card

The metal card showcases both the Arculus and Litecoin brands, embodying the fusion of security and innovation both brands represent. This new, limited-edition card will be sold at a discounted price of $84 USD + tax (compared to the regular price of $99) at the Arculus booth during the Litecoin Summit only. All purchases must be made in person in US dollars via credit card or cash. You can buy multiple cards as the technology will support multiple wallets. Also, customers will be able to buy the card after the Summit online for $99. Details to come.

The Litecoin Summit

The Litecoin Summit will be held in Nashville, TN, on July 24-25, 2024. This premier event will bring together thought leaders, innovators, and enthusiasts from the crypto and NFT community. For more information about the event, please visit the Litecoin Summit.

Visit the Arculus booth at the Summit to secure your exclusive Arculus x Litecoin cold storage wallet. This collaboration between Arculus and Litecoin marks a milestone in our journey towards secure, accessible cryptocurrency storage solutions. We look forward to seeing you at the Summit!

entry.title: Embracing the Future of a Frictionless Digital Security Experience: Key Insights from Forbes Research for Banks & Financial Institutions
entry.content:
Introduction: Navigating the Digital Security Landscape

Today, digital experiences are as routine as morning coffee. However, providing robust security and delivering frictionless customer experience in this digital world has become a challenge for banks and financial institutions. A new study by Forbes, “Security Should Be Simple: Your Road Map For Preventing Fraud And Building Trust”, sheds light on this critical need, actively advocating for innovation and simplicity while evaluating digital security strategies.

The Ongoing Threat of Fraud: A Major Concern for Financial Institutions

The ongoing threat of fraud is a major concern for banks and financial institutions. Technological advancements have increased the complexity and frequency of fraud attempts, posing significant challenges for these organizations.The Forbes study reveals that 68% of decision-makers surveyed confirm their commitment to strengthening fraud detection efforts. This isn’t just a reaction to current threats; it's a proactive step towards ensuring that businesses remain vigilant and innovative in the face of constantly evolving digital security risks. Staying ahead in digital security means anticipating challenges and adopting more sophisticated strategies.

Traditional Password Systems: Why They’re Failing

Traditional password systems, with their complexity and costliness, are proving inadequate. With 65% of business leaders surveyed by Forbes advocating for investment in more efficient solutions, there’s a clear need for innovation. The persistent problem of call center password resets and authentication practices is more than just an operational issue—it’s a reflection of the deeper inefficiencies in current security protocols. This underscores the imperative for security solutions that not only protect but also enhance the customer experience by being intuitive and unobtrusive.

A Consensus on Change: Moving Beyond Password-Based Security

Against this backdrop, a consensus is forming around the limitations of password-based security. The intricacy of balancing security with convenience has emerged as a challenge business leaders are trying to solve. The Forbes survey findings reflect this ongoing struggle to create digital security measures that are effective yet intuitive, offering protection without disrupting the user experience.With 59% of respondents in the Forbes report advocating for a shift towards more secure authentication methods, this trend points towards a future where security is not just about protection but also about enhancing usability. Financial institutions aim for security protocols that are effective but almost invisible to the end-user, ensuring safety without sacrifice. As we all know, the best security is the one people will use.

Arculus Authenticate™: Pioneering a New Era of Digital Security

As banks and financial institutions look to the future, adopting technologies that protect and enhance the user experience is paramount. Arculus Authenticate exemplifies this new direction in digital security. By simplifying authentication at the ‘tap of a card,’ Arculus is setting a new standard in secure authentication. This approach brings together the ultimate security of hardware keys, within the convenience of a payment card, and directly addresses the common frustrations associated with traditional security methods. With Arculus Authenticate, financial institutions can deliver a future where security empowers users rather than limiting them.

Envisioning a Seamless and Secure Future

As leaders, let’s envision a future where digital security seamlessly blends into daily routines, while creating a world where customers feel both safe and valued-- that future is here.
